sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Mediano (entre 1,2 y 2,1 m de altura) o Pequeño (entre 60 cm y 1,2 m de altura), elegido al seleccionar la especie

entries.name: Resistencia celestial
entries: Tienes resistencia al daño necrótico y al radiante.

entries.name: Visión en la oscuridad
entries: Tienes visión en la oscuridad hasta 60 pies (18 m).

entries.name: Manos curativas
entries: Como acción de magia, tocas a una criatura y tiras una cantidad de d4 igual a tu bonificador por competencia. La criatura recupera una cantidad de puntos de golpe igual al resultado total de la tirada. Cuando uses este atributo, no podrás volver a hacerlo hasta que finalices un descanso largo.

entries.name: Portador de luz
entries: Conoces el truco {@spell Luz|XPHB}. El Carisma es tu aptitud mágica para lanzarlo..

entries.name: Revelación celestial
entries: Cuando alcanzas el nivel 3 de personaje, puedes transformarte como acción adicional y usar una de las opciones que aparecen a continuación (elige la opción cada vez que te transformes). La trans- formación dura 1 minuto o hasta que le pongas fin (no requiere acción). Cuando te transformes, no podrás volver a hacerlo hasta que finalices un descanso largo.

Una vez en cada uno de tus turnos hasta que finalice la transformación, puedes infligir daño adicional a un objetivo cuando le hagas daño con un ataque o un conjuro. El daño adicional es igual a tu bonificador por competencia y el tipo es necrótico para Mortaja necrótica o radiante para Alas celestiales y Fulgor interior.
Estas son las opciones de transformación:

items.name: Alas celestiales
entries: Dos alas espectrales brotan temporalmente de tu espalda. Hasta que la transformación termine, tienes una velocidad volando igual a tu velocidad.

items.name: Fulgor interior
entries: De tus ojos y tu boca surge temporalmente una luz abrasadora. Durante este tiempo, emites luz brillante en un radio de 10 pies (3 m) y luz tenue 3 m más allá y, al final de cada uno de tus turnos, cada criatura a 10 pies (3 m) o menos de ti recibirá una cantidad de daño radiante igual a tu bonificador por competencia.

items.name: Mortaja necrótica
entries: Tus ojos se vuelven brevemente pozos de oscuridad y unas alas que no te permiten volar brotan temporalmente de tu espalda. Las criaturas que no sean tus aliados y estén a 10 pies (3 m) o menos de ti deberán superar una tirada de salvación de Carisma (CD 8 más tu modificador por Carisma y tu bonificador por competencia) o tendrán el estado de {@condition Asustado|XPHB} hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Mediano (entre 1,5 y 2,1 m de altura)

entries.name: Linaje dracónico
entries: Tu linaje proviene de un progenitor dragón. Elige el tipo de dragón en la tabla “Ancestros dracónicos”. Tu elección afectará a tus atributos Ataque de aliento y Resistencia al daño además de a tu aspecto.

entries.name: Ataque de aliento
entries: Cuando lleves a cabo la acción de atacar en tu turno, puedes sustituir uno de tus ataques por una exhalación de energía mágica en un cono de 15 pies (4,5 m) o en una línea de 30 pies (9 m) de largo y 5 pies (1,5 m) de ancho (elige la forma cada vez). Todas las criaturas situadas en esa zona deberán hacer una tirada de salvación de Destreza (CD 8 más tu modificador por Constitución y tu bonificador por competencia). Si la fallan, sufrirán {@damage 1d10} de daño del tipo determinado por tu atributo Linaje dracónico. Si la superan, recibirán la mitad de ese daño. El daño aumenta en 1d10 cuando alcanzas los niveles 5 ({@damage 2d10}), 11 ({@damage 3d10}) y 17 ({@damage 4d10}) de personaje.
Puedes utilizar este ataque de aliento una cantidad de veces igual a tu bonificador por competencia y recuperas todos los usos tras finalizar un descanso largo.

entries.name: Resistencia al daño
entries: Tienes resistencia al tipo de daño determinado por tu atributo Linaje dracónico.

entries.name: Visión en la oscuridad
entries: Tienes visión en la oscuridad hasta 60 pies (18 m).

entries.name: Vuelo dracónico
entries: Cuando alcanzas el nivel 5 de personaje, puedes canalizar la magia dracónica para volar de forma temporal. Como acción adicional, haces que en la espalda te broten unas alas espectrales que duran 10 minutos o hasta que las repliegues (no requiere acción) o tengas el estado de incapacitado. Durante ese tiempo, tendrás una velocidad volando igual a tu velocidad. Tus alas parecen hechas de la misma energía que tu ataque de aliento. Cuando uses este atributo, no podrás volver a hacerlo hasta que finalices un descanso largo.

items.name: Ataque de aliento
entries: Cuando lleves a cabo la acción de atacar en tu turno, puedes sustituir uno de tus ataques por una exhalación de energía mágica en un cono de 15 pies (4,5 m) o en una línea de 30 pies (9 m) de largo y 5 pies (1,5 m) de ancho (elige la forma cada vez). Todas las criaturas situadas en esa zona deberán hacer una tirada de salvación de Destreza (CD 8 más tu modificador por Constitución y tu bonificador por competencia). Si la fallan, sufrirán {@damage 1d10} de daño de {{damageType}}. Si la superan, recibirán la mitad de ese daño. El daño aumenta en 1d10 cuando alcanzas los niveles 5 ({@damage 2d10}), 11 ({@damage 3d10}) y 17 ({@damage 4d10}) de personaje.
Puedes utilizar este ataque de aliento una cantidad de veces igual a tu bonificador por competencia y recuperas todos los usos tras finalizar un descanso largo.

items.name: Resistencia al daño
entries: Tienes resistencia al daño de {{damageType}}.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Mediano (entre 1,2 y 1,5 m de altura)

entries.name: Afinidad con la piedra
entries: Como acción adicional, ganas la capacidad de sentir vibraciones con un alcance de 60 pies (18 m) durante 10 minutos. Debes encontrarte sobre una superficie de piedra o en contacto con una superficie de piedra para usar esta capacidad. La piedra puede ser natural o labrada.
Puedes usar esta acción adicional una cantidad de veces igual a tu bonificador por competencia y recuperas todos los usos tras finalizar un descanso largo.

entries.name: Aguante enano
entries: Tus puntos de golpe máximos se incrementan en 1 y aumentarán en 1 más cada vez que subas un nivel.

entries.name: Resistencia enana
entries: Tienes resistencia al daño de veneno. También tienes ventaja en las tiradas de salvación para evitar o poner fin al estado de {@condition Envenenado|XPHB}.

entries.name: Visión en la oscuridad
entries: Tienes visión en la oscuridad hasta 120 pies (36 m).

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Mediano (entre 1,5 y 1,8 m de altura)

entries.name: Linaje élfico
entries: Formas parte de un linaje que te otorga capacidades sobrenaturales. Elige un linaje de la tabla “Linajes élficos”. Obtienes el beneficio de nivel 1 de ese linaje.

Cuando alcanzas los niveles 3 y 5 de personaje, aprendes un conjuro de nivel superior, como se muestra en la tabla. Siempre tienes ese conjuro preparado. Puedes lanzarlo una vez sin gastar un espacio de conjuro y recuperas la capacidad de hacerlo de esta forma tras finalizar un descanso largo. También puedes lanzar el conjuro usando cualquier espacio de conjuro que tengas del nivel apropiado.
La Inteligencia, la Sabiduría o el Carisma es tu aptitud mágica para los conjuros que lances con este atributo (elige la característica al seleccionar el linaje).

entries.caption: LINAJES ÉLFICOS
rows: Conoces el truco {@spell Prestidigitación|XPHB}. Tras finalizar un descanso largo, puedes sustituir ese truco por {@filter otro truco|spells|level=0|class=Wizard} diferente de la lista de conjuros de mago.
El alcance de tu visión en la oscuridad aumenta a 120 pies (36 m). También conoces el truco {@spell Luces danzantes|XPHB}.
Tu velocidad aumenta a 35 pies (10,5 m). También conoces el truco {@spell Saber druídico.|XPHB}.

entries.name: Linaje feérico
entries: Tienes ventaja en las tiradas de salvación para evitar o poner fin al estado de {@condition Hechizado|XPHB}.

entries.name: Sentidos agudos
entries: Tienes competencia en la habilidad de {@skill Percepción|XPHB}, {@skill Perspicacia|XPHB} o {@skill Supervivencia|XPHB}.

entries.name: Trance
entries: No necesitas dormir y la magia no puede dormirte. Puedes finalizar un descanso largo en 4 horas si las pasas en una meditación similar a un trance, tiempo durante el cual conservas la consciencia.

entries.name: Visión en la oscuridad
entries: Tienes visión en la oscuridad hasta 60 pies (18 m).

items.name: Elven Lineage (Drow)
entries: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. The range of your Visión en la oscuridad increases to 120 feet. You also know the {@spell Luces danzantes|XPHB} cantrip.

When you reach character level 3, you learn the {@spell Fuego feérico|XPHB} spell. When you reach character level 5, you also learn the {@spell Darkness|XPHB} spell. You always have these spells prepared, and you can cast each spell once without a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the lineage).

items.name: Elven Lineage (High Elf)
entries: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. You know the {@spell Prestidigitación|XPHB} cantrip. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can replace that cantrip with a different {@filter cantrip from the Wizard spell list|spells|level=0|class=Wizard}.

When you reach character level 3, you learn the {@spell Detect Magic|XPHB} spell. When you reach character level 5, you also learn the {@spell Misty Step|XPHB} spell. You always have these spells prepared, and you can cast each spell once without a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the lineage).

items.name: Elven Lineage (Wood Elf)
entries: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. Your Speed increases to 35 feet. You also know the {@spell Druidcraft|XPHB} cantrip.

When you reach character level 3, you learn the {@spell Longstrider|XPHB} spell. When you reach character level 5, you also learn the {@spell Pass without Trace|XPHB} spell. You always have these spells prepared, and you can cast each spell once without a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the lineage).

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Small (about 3-4 feet tall)

entries.name: Visión en la oscuridad
entries: Tienes visión en la oscuridad hasta 60 pies (18 m).

entries.name: Gnomish Cunning
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

entries.name: Gnomish Lineage
entries: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose one of the following options; whichever one you choose, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the lineage):

items.name: Forest Gnome
entries: You know the {@spell Ilusión menor|XPHB} cantrip. You also always have the {@spell Speak with Animals|XPHB} spell prepared. You can cast it without a spell slot a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also use any spell slots you have to cast the spell.

items.name: Rock Gnome
entries: You know the {@spell Reparar|XPHB} and {@spell Prestidigitación|XPHB} cantrips. In addition, you can spend 10 minutes casting {@spell Prestidigitación|XPHB} to create a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 HP), such as a toy, fire starter, or music box. When you create the device, you determine its function by choosing one effect from {@spell Prestidigitación|XPHB}; the device produces that effect whenever you or another creature takes a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to activate it with a touch. If the chosen effect has options within it, you choose one of those options for the device when you create it. For example, if you choose the spell's ignite-extinguish effect, you determine whether the device ignites or extinguishes fire; the device doesn't do both. You can have three such devices in existence at a time, and each falls apart 8 hours after its creation or when you dismantle it with a touch as a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action.

items.name: Gnomish Lineage (Forest Gnome)
entries: You know the {@spell Ilusión menor|XPHB} cantrip. You also always have the {@spell Speak with Animals|XPHB} spell prepared. You can cast it without a spell slot a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also use any spell slots you have to cast the spell.

items.name: Gnomish Lineage (Rock Gnome)
entries: You know the {@spell Reparar|XPHB} and {@spell Prestidigitación|XPHB} cantrips. In addition, you can spend 10 minutes casting {@spell Prestidigitación|XPHB} to create a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 HP), such as a toy, fire starter, or music box. When you create the device, you determine its function by choosing one effect from {@spell Prestidigitación|XPHB}; the device produces that effect whenever you or another creature takes a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to activate it with a touch. If the chosen effect has options within it, you choose one of those options for the device when you create it. For example, if you choose the spell's ignite-extinguish effect, you determine whether the device ignites or extinguishes fire; the device doesn't do both. You can have three such devices in existence at a time, and each falls apart 8 hours after its creation or when you dismantle it with a touch as a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Medium (about 7-8 feet tall)

entries.name: Giant Ancestry
entries: You are descended from Giants. Choose one of the following benefits—a supernatural boon from your ancestry; you can use the chosen benefit a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}:

items.name: Cloud's Jaunt (Cloud Giant)
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, you magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

items.name: Fire's Burn (Fire Giant)
entries: When you hit a target with an attack roll and deal damage to it, you can also deal {@damage 1d10} Fire damage to that target.

items.name: Frost's Chill (Frost Giant)
entries: When you hit a target with an attack roll and deal damage to it, you can also deal {@damage 1d6} Cold damage to that target and reduce its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Hill's Tumble (Hill Giant)
entries: When you hit a Large or smaller creature with an attack roll and deal damage to it, you can give that target the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Stone's Endurance (Stone Giant)
entries: When you take damage, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to roll {@dice 1d12}. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled and reduce the damage by that total.

items.name: Storm's Thunder (Storm Giant)
entries: When you take damage from a creature within 60 feet of you, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to deal {@damage 1d8} Thunder damage to that creature.

entries.name: Large Form
entries: Starting at character level 5, you can change your size to Large as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} if you're in a big enough space. This transformation lasts for 10 minutes or until you end it (no action required). For that duration, you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Strength checks, and your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} increases by 10 feet. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on any ability check you make to end the {@condition Agarrado|XPHB} condition. You also count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity.

items.name: Giant Ancestry (Cloud)
entries: You are descended from Giants, granting you a supernatural boon; you can use this boon a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}:

items.name: Cloud's Jaunt
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, you magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

items.name: Giant Ancestry (Fire)
entries: You are descended from Giants, granting you a supernatural boon; you can use this boon a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}:

items.name: Fire's Burn
entries: When you hit a target with an attack roll and deal damage to it, you can also deal {@damage 1d10} Fire damage to that target.

items.name: Giant Ancestry (Frost)
entries: You are descended from Giants, granting you a supernatural boon; you can use this boon a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}:

items.name: Frost's Chill
entries: When you hit a target with an attack roll and deal damage to it, you can also deal {@damage 1d6} Cold damage to that target and reduce its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Giant Ancestry (Hill)
entries: You are descended from Giants, granting you a supernatural boon; you can use this boon a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}:

items.name: Hill's Tumble
entries: When you hit a Large or smaller creature with an attack roll and deal damage to it, you can give that target the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Giant Ancestry (Stone)
entries: You are descended from Giants, granting you a supernatural boon; you can use this boon a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}:

items.name: Stone's Endurance
entries: When you take damage, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to roll {@dice 1d12}. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled and reduce the damage by that total.

items.name: Giant Ancestry (Storm)
entries: You are descended from Giants, granting you a supernatural boon; you can use this boon a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}:

items.name: Storm's Thunder
entries: When you take damage from a creature within 60 feet of you, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to deal {@damage 1d8} Thunder damage to that creature.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Small (about 2-3 feet tall)

entries.name: Brave
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws you make to avoid or end the {@condition Asustado|XPHB} condition.

entries.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: You can move through the space of any creature that is a size larger than you, but you can't stop in the same space.

entries.name: Luck
entries: When you roll a 1 on the {@dice d20} of a {@variantrule Prueba con d20|XPHB}, you can reroll the die, and you must use the new roll.

entries.name: Naturally Stealthy
entries: You can take the {@action Hide|XPHB} action even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Medium (about 4-7 feet tall) or Small (about 2-4 feet tall), chosen when you select this species

entries.name: Resourceful
entries: You gain {@variantrule Inspiración Heroica|XPHB} whenever you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

entries.name: Skillful
entries: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

entries.name: Versatile
entries: You gain an {@filter Origin feat|feats|category=o} of your choice.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Medium (about 6-7 feet tall)

entries.name: Adrenaline Rush
entries: You can take the {@action Dash|XPHB} action as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}. When you do so, you gain a number of {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}.

You can use this trait a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

entries.name: Visión en la oscuridad
entries: Tienes visión en la oscuridad hasta 120 pies (36 m).

entries.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When you are reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} instead. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Medium (about 4-7 feet tall) or Small (about 3-4 feet tall), chosen when you select this species

entries.name: Visión en la oscuridad
entries: Tienes visión en la oscuridad hasta 60 pies (18 m).

entries.name: Fiendish Legacy
entries: You are the recipient of a legacy that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose a legacy from the Fiendish Legacies table. You gain the level 1 benefit of the chosen legacy.

When you reach character levels 3 and 5, you learn a higher-level spell, as shown on the table. You always have that spell prepared. You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the legacy).

entries.caption: Fiendish Legacies
rows: You have Resistance to Poison damage. You also know the {@spell Rociada venenosa|XPHB} cantrip.
You have Resistance to Necrotic damage. You also know the {@spell Chill Touch|XPHB} cantrip.
You have Resistance to Fire damage. You also know the {@spell Descarga de fuego|XPHB} cantrip.

entries.name: Otherworldly Presence
entries: You know the {@spell Taumaturgia|XPHB} cantrip. When you cast it with this trait, the spell uses the same spellcasting ability you use for your Fiendish Legacy Trait.

items.name: Fiendish Legacy (Abyssal)
entries: You are the recipient of a legacy that grants you supernatural abilities. You have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Poison damage. You also know the {@spell Rociada venenosa|XPHB} cantrip.

When you reach character level 3, you learn the {@spell Ray of Sickness|XPHB} spell. When you reach character level 5, you also learn the {@spell Hold Person|XPHB} spell. You always have these spells prepared, and you can cast each spell once without a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the legacy).

items.name: Fiendish Legacy (Chthonic)
entries: You are the recipient of a legacy that grants you supernatural abilities. You have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Necrotic damage. You also know the {@spell Chill Touch|XPHB} cantrip.

When you reach character level 3, you learn the {@spell False Life|XPHB} spell. When you reach character level 5, you also learn the {@spell Ray of Enfeeblement|XPHB} spell. You always have these spells prepared, and you can cast each spell once without a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the legacy).

items.name: Fiendish Legacy (Infernal)
entries: You are the recipient of a legacy that grants you supernatural abilities. You have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Fire damage. You also know the {@spell Descarga de fuego|XPHB} cantrip.

When you reach character level 3, you learn the {@spell Hellish Rebuke|XPHB} spell. When you reach character level 5, you also learn the {@spell Darkness|XPHB} spell. You always have these spells prepared, and you can cast each spell once without a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the legacy).
